Welcome to Word Embedding Warehouse's documentation!
====================================================

Welcome to the Word Embedding Warehouse documentation!

This tool will assist you in providing the pretrained weights of BERT-based representations
for both PyTorch and Tensorflow.

Source code is available in `my github <https://github.com/shayanfazeli/word_embedding_warehouse>`_.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   api/modules.rst
   api/word_embedding_warehouse.bin.rst
   api/word_embedding_warehouse.library.rst
   api/word_embedding_warehouse.rst
